[File: contract/AElf.Contracts.Genesis/BasicContractZero_Helper.cs] [Function: DeploySmartContract()] [Event Replay] Can the ContractDeployed event at lines 73-82 be replayed or monitored to extract deployment patterns and predict future contract addresses for front-running attacks? (Low)
